name: MegaCorn
description:
Instructions

It's better to download game and play it on your PC

Game rules are easy - Corn Tree gives you food. You should manage your people to get water and do your best to make it bloom soon.

Assign your people to the buildings to increase resources income. 

When corn tree blooming  state is changed it starts to produce less food and consume more water.

Different types of buildings give different resources.

  • Well House gives you water but increases food consumption
  • Fertilizer gives you food but increases water consumption
  • Cantine (we know that right word is Canteen) helps people restore energy faster
  • When you’ll need more people - just send 2 citizens to the Kulturehaus (be careful, it works only if there is a pair inside)
  • If you feel lack of resources - send your civilian in Palace of Cornflakes he will be sacrificed to give your tree some water (and the tree gives you food in return)

If you have errors - it's better to play PC version (link below). PC version doesn't has these problems.

Game

Hi all! To be honest it’s our first jam and we happy to show you our game! 

We want to tell you an economy simulator-driven story about corn tree. This tree is the only one tree in the world that can produce food so our citizen believe that it’s almost a god! 

Description

Suddenly Corn Tree became covered with mysterious buds and we believe it will definitely bloom soon. Keeping it alive has become the number one mission. When the Tree will spread its seeds - the whole world will be saved from starving (I’m not talking about oxygen balance and other pros of Corn Trees). 

So don’t pass by - join the game and together we will grow this corn tree!

It’s time to complete the five-year plan in 72 hours, if you know what I mean;)

P.S. if you don't do this your tree will wither and dry up. Manage your corntree to spread the corn around the world!

P.P.S. If you like our game don't forget to leave a comment here or on our ludum dare submission page https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/megacorn-strategy-economy-simulator
